publicationstmt.publisher: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2025-04-03 23:59:05 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

change.item: This resource was modified by the ArchivesSpace Preprocessor developed by the Harvard Library (https://github.com/harvard-library/archivesspace-preprocessor)

repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations. Library

did.abstract: This collection consists of song books published by various labor oganizations, recreation manuals, sheet music from the ILGWU musical "Pins and Needdles," and other pamphlets documenting folk and work songs.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Labor Song Books #5189. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was re-processed in March 2025 to improve description and access to materials.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Second printing.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Fourth printing.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tenth printing.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Six copies of the ACTWU Song Book. There are four different printings, all editions contain the same content but have different covers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Red cover with photograph of musicians.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Green cover with drawings of musical instruments (2 copies).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Powder blue cover with drawings of marching union members (2 copies).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Large, powder blue cover with drawings of marching union members.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes foreword by Earl Robinson. Published by the Workers' Bookshop.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Prepared for the National Recreation Association by Frank A. Staples.

scopecontent.p: Edited by Ethel Bowers.

did.unittitle: Parties, musical mixers and simple square dances

scopecontent.p: Edited by Ethel Bowers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Published by New York State Electric and Gas (3 copies).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 2 copies.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Cornell Organization for Labor Action. In addition to traditonal union songs, this includes Cornell specific songs and a song celebrating the ILR School.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Published by the ILGWU Educational Department.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: By Edith Fowke and Joe Glazer. Music arrangements: Kenneth Bray.

did.unittitle: Songs of work and protest: 100 favorite songs of American workers complete with music and historical notes

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: By Edith Fowke and Joe Glazer. Music arrangements: Kenneth Bray.

did.unittitle: Games file for clubs, families, camps, church, parties, outings

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Published by Workers' Section of the Group Work Division, Health and Welfare Federation of Allegheny County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Published by the Children's Bureau, U.S. Department of Labor (2 editions).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: By Ella Gardner. Bureau publication no. 231.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: By Ella Gardner. Bureau publication no. 231.

did.unittitle: Free labour sings / Chants du travail libre / Freie arbeiter singen / Cuando los trabajadores libres cantan / Vrije arbeiders zingen / Fria arbetare sjunger

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Presented by the International Confederation of Free Trade Unions, distributed by the International Labour Film Institute.

did.unittitle: Labor Arts presents Songs of the Wobblies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Program notes and lyrics from the latest labor arts album of significant American labor songs. (2 copies)

did.unittitle: A handbook for UAW-CIO recreation leaders

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: By Melvin G. West, International recreation Director.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: By Covington Hall

did.unittitle: Sing a song of unsung heroes and heroines

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Text by Alice M. Hoffman, tape by Tom Juravich, illustrations by Franklin W. Russell. No cassette tape is included with this booklet.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sheet music for "Workers of the world awaken!" by Joe Hill (2 copies).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Compiled by Zilphia Horton, published by the Textile Workers Union of America. Two editions; the editions have the same content but different publishing locations and advertisements.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Published in New York. Advertisement on back cover is for "Textile Labor," the official publication of the TWUA. (1 copy).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Published in Atlanta, Georgia. Advertisement on back cover is for "The Industrial Leader." (5 copies)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 2 copies.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pamphlet is arranged in sections: Songs of the IWW; Popular trade union songs; the Socialist "classics"; and Mixed categories (3 copies).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: By Morris Rosenfeld, translated by Rose Pastor Stokos. From the ILGWU Education Department.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sheet music for the song "The International." Adapted from Chas. H. Kerr's translations; harmonized by Rudolf Liebich.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Published by the Labor Heritage Foundation. Pamphlet is undated, but the songs published in this booklet do not have a copyright date later than 1983. Foreward written by Joe Uehlein.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Song book for the UCLEA NE Summer Institute for Union Women, held at Cornell University's ILR School from July 11-16, 1993. This book includes songs in Spanish, Xhosa, and Hatian Creole.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: From the School for Workers, University of Wisconsin Madison. Song book for summer sessions, 1938.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Presented to delegates at the 40th annivaersay convention of the ILGWU. By the ILGWU Locals of New York City, May 27 - June 7, 1940.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains three different editions of the ILGWU song book "Let's Sing." The earliest copy was self-printed in 1935. The first and second editions are tentatively dated to 1937 and 1938, respectively.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Self printed pamphlet, by the ILGWU education department. Contains both lyrics and sheet music.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1st edition. Published by the ILGWU education department (2 copies). Tentative date of publication, 1937.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 2nd edition. Published by the ILGWU education department (3 copies). Tentative date of publication, 1938.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collected and arranged by Ida Levin.
